snippet: Jurors in Brooklyn will have to decide if Abid Naseer’s emails were innocent chitchat about women or coded messages to a Qaeda handler about a bombing plot.
abstract: Jurors hear closing arguments at New York terrorism trial of Abid Naseer, Al Qaeda operative accused of planning attacks in London, New York and Denmark.
lead_paragraph: Jurors in Brooklyn will have to decide if Abid Naseer’s emails were innocent chitchat about women or coded messages to a Qaeda handler about a bombing plot.

headline.main: Terrorism Case Against Pakistani Man Is Going to Jury
headline.print_headline: Terrorism Case Against Pakistani Man Is Going to Jury
